summary: An ordinance providing for the condemnation and appropriation of lots 1, 2, 5 and 6, inclusive, in block 51, Burke's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, for park and parkway purposes and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
